page.title: 13Brisley Adult Recreation
page.content: Most women like reading or gardening, but some like watching tennis on television and listening to the radio. Some belong to the Womens Institute which meets in Brisley Village Hall. The men in the area like doing unusual things for their hobbies which we all take advantage of, like playing the fiddle,carving things out of wood,relaxing,watching T.V., building things,fixing engines and working with pigs. The women that do hobbies out of the area have more involved hobbies such as singing (E.Dereham) and keep fit (Whissonsett).There is a lot of effort goes into these hobbies. Some men go out of the block to do their hobbies: building trailers (Gressenhall), sailing (Norfolk coast),or playing tennis (Fakenham).
